name: ChildInfluenzaVaccineAdministered
title: Child Influenza Vaccine Administered
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for an influenza vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure for use in children 2 and younger.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an influenza vaccination for use in children 2 and younger.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes influenza vaccines not recommended for use in children 2 and younger.)
